synopsis.text: Doll s with hearts and shadows without faces inhabit the grand Shadows House, a mansion perched atop a cliff. The faceless shadow nobles, who emit soot when agitated, rely on their living dolls to maintain the mansion and express their emotions. Among these living dolls is the lively and inquisitive Emilico, who serves her soft-spoken master, Kate Shadow-sama. As Emilico navigates her duties and uncovers the enigmatic secrets of the mansion, she forms bonds with her fellow dolls and delves deeper into the mysterious world of the Shadows House. Despite the rules that forbid her from dwelling on insignificant matters, Emilico's curiosity propels her to explore the depths of her own existence and the purpose behind the living dolls. Join Emilico and Kate as they embark on a journey of self-discovery and unravel the hidden truths of the soot-filled Shadows House.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
